description.en: Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair, his wife leaves him, and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day, however, a flyer from a strange religious group, the "Heart Laughing Society," changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife, whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!
description.ru:
Томодзи Камомэ — писатель-фрилансер, потерявший любимую дочь в результате несчастного случая. В отчаянии от него уходит жена, и он проводит свои дни в одиночестве, закрывшись от внешнего мира.
Однако однажды листовка странной религиозной группы «Общество смеющегося сердца» меняет его судьбу. В ней он увидел свою жену, с которой потерял связь...

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: SatoruCie (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Satoru x Ciel Fan Manga
Regarding Reincarnated to Slime: Satoru x Ciel Fan Manga

description.en:
**Web Novel Spoilers Warning: The story takes place on Earth after end of the Web Novel.**

---

Rimuru plants a parallel existance inside Satoru Mikami, to live his life with Ciel and finish his missions he was unable to when he first died.

One day, Momoko is attacked by Pluie, a demon who's after her keepsake ring left by her mother. Just then, the angel Limone gives Momoko the Sacred Mirror, allowing her to transform into the legendary Love Angel Wedding Peach and drive away demons! And so, Peach and her fellow angels fight to protect the lovers of the world from demons pursuing them for their "wave of love"...!
___
Chapter numbers for the Selene Scans version do not match up, but nothing is missing.

Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

description.en:
Lea wrote a suicide note ahead of the wedding.
Because she'll die after the first night.

It was the miserable end of a princess who devoted her entire life to her country and the royal family.
Before she gives up her life, Lea plans her final revenge on the royal family.

It is to become a new bride who has lost her innocence.

"Why did you give up your first experience like this? Don't you want to run away?
"I... want to die."

It was an impulsive remark because he was just a one-night stand.
I thought it was meant to end like that.
Until we meet again in an unexpected place.

He eroded her orderly daily life.
Despite knowing it was a dangerous relationship, she couldn't resist him.
What on earth is that man thinking?

"You don't remember?"
The man said with a fierce smile.

"I told you I'd ruin your life."
description.id: Putri Leah membuat surat bunuh diri menjelang pernikahannya. Karena dia yakin akan mati setelah malam pernikahannya; akhir yang sangat menyedihkan dari seorang putri yang mengorbankan hidupnya untuk kerajaannya. Tetapi sebelum menyerahkan hidupnya, Leah berencana untuk membuat balas dendam terakhirnya kepada keluarganya. Meskipun dia telah menjadi mayat yang dingin, dia akan membuat mereka hancur. Dia akan membuat mereka malu dengan menjadi pengantin yang tidak perawan lagi. “Kenapa kau justru membuang keperawananmu? Bukankah kau hanya ingin melarikan diri?" "Aku ... aku hanya ingin mati." Leah secara impulsif menceritakan hal tersebut kepada pria yang menghabiskan malam pertama dengannya.

title.en: Koe no Chiisai Komori-san to Kusodeka Oogoe no Oobayashi-kun

altTitles.en: The Quiet Komori-san and the Loud Oobayashi-kun
KOMORI-SAN in a small voice & OBAYASHI-KUN in a loud voice

altTitles.vi: Komori-san trầm lặng và Oobayashi-kun ồn ào

altTitles.ja: 声の小さい小森さんとクソデカ大声の大林くん

altTitles.ko: 목소리가 작은 코모리 양과 목소리가 엄청 큰 오바야시 군

altTitles.zh: 轻声细语小森同学和震耳欲聋大林君

altTitles.en: Komori-san With a Small Voice and Obayashi-kun With a Loud Voice

description.en: Komori-san has a complex about her soft voice, compared to the loud and brash Ohayashi-kun. Their vocal volume may be opposites, but their feelings for each other are mutual. Will they ever be able to properly communicate?
description.es-la: Komori-san tem um complexo sobre sua voz suave, em comparação com o Oobayashi-kun alto e impetuoso. Seu volume vocal pode ser oposto, mas seus sentimentos um pelo outro são mútuos. Eles algum dia serão capazes de se comunicar adequadamente?

title.en: My Clumsy and Erotic Neighbor Sayuri-san

altTitles.ja: 不器用でエロい隣人さゆりさん

altTitles.es-la: Mi torpe y erótica vecina Sayuri-san

description.en: Series Follows Our Main Character and His Interactions With His Neighbor Sayuri-san.
description.ja: 高校生の主人公が、隣人の主婦である「さゆりさん」と様々なエロティックなシチュエーションを繰り広げるというストーリー。

description.en: A 35-year-old OL one day suddenly turns into a magical girl.
When a police officer is posted to a remote village in the countryside, little does he realize he's encroaching on a community of cannibals…
description.ru:
Полицейский Дайго Агава вместе с семьёй переезжает в горную деревушку под названием Цветочная. Жители деревни горячо принимают семью Дайго.
Однажды в лесу находят труп старушки. После этого происшествия Дайго постепенно начинает осознавать все происходящие вокруг странности и приходит к мысли, что в этой деревне едят людей. Начинают происходить очень странные инциденты, атмосфера отчуждения наполняет деревню. Сможет ли обычный полицейский разгадать все ужасные тайны, которая таит в себе эта деревня и, что важнее, сможет ли он остаться в живых?

description.en: Chikako Fujitani (18), 1st year at the Hanano Women’s College starts living alone at the same apartment as Kanro (An aspiring mangaka from the same school.) and Chiaki (A bus guide who pretends to be a college student to get a man.) While on the “Country-Bumpkin” tour she encounters Iwata, reconnects with her middle school crush, Nagae, and meets the landlady’s son, Makoto. It’s the kind of story about the bold and flimsy feelings of college students on an awkward, realistic love.
description.ja: 花野女子短大1年、藤谷知香子、18歳。念願のひとり暮らしを同じアパートのカンロちゃん（同じ短大で漫画家志望）、千明さん（バスガイドをしているが、女子大生と偽って男を物色中）と楽しんでいる。おのぼりさんツアーで知りあった岩田君、中学の時の憧れ、永江君、大家さんの息子の誠君…気になる男子も多々…。大学生の大胆で繊細、そして不器用な恋愛をリアルに描いた、とっておきの恋のお話。

title.en: Yopparai Touzoku, Dorei no Shoujo wo Kau

altTitles.ja: 酔っぱらい盗賊、奴隷の少女を買う

altTitles.en: A Drunk Thief Bought a Slave Girl

description.en:
A hangover leads to a shared life between a thief and a slave girl.
 
Harris is an adventurer who works as a thief and scout, a job that is often shunned due to poor reputation.
 
One day he gets drunk and buys a slave girl, Tiana. Tiana, who had been treated badly and not given enough food until then, comes to adore Harris, who treats her kindly, as her master. Harris, who had been hoping that Tiana would grow up to be a beautiful woman, is gradually drawn to her because of her innocence.
 
Harris' life changes drastically when he begins living with Tiana: warm meals, freshly washed clothes, and interaction with the townspeople who had never come close to him before. On the other hand, he finds himself in more and more troublesome situations, will he manages to escape from them with his skill and tact...?
 
This is the story of the "rebirth" of a shabby thief, which begins with an encounter with a slave girl.

altTitles.ja: 異形頭さんとニンゲンちゃん

altTitles.en: The Aberrant-Headed Guy and the Human Girl

description.en: The main character who got worked to the bone as a corporate slave office lady in the current world got transported to another world, where she became the pet of aberrant head-san. Although they both hold romantic feelings towards each other, it's hard for them to develop their love with their difference in species standing in the way.
description.uk: Наша головна героїня, втомлена життям корпоративного раба, потрапляє в інший світ і живе як домашня тваринка Гетероморфної Голови-сана. Вони обоє мають романтичні почуття одне до одного, які, втім, через расові відмінності не можуть розвиватися, хоча...

description.en:
In a world where the Han Empire never fell, martial arts is a power used to squeeze the people dry. So when a new continent is discovered, both good and evil men alike flee to settle there and escape the tyranny of the Emperor, opening up the era of a Martial Wild West.

In the turbulent frontier, Zhang Qian is a man that reincarnated from our cushy, modern world, but his new world is nothing like the fantastical world he dreamed about from reading martial arts novels. While the martial arts in his new world are powerful, they are also too crude and lack elegance. And so Qian journeys the new continent for his dream of bringing true martial arts back to the new martial realm.
description.pt-br: Em um mundo que o Império Han nunca caiu, artes marciais são um poder usado para oprimir as pessoas. Então quando um novo continente é descoberto, tanto os bons quanto os maus fogem para se estabelecer e fugir da tirania do Imperador, dando início a era do Oeste Selvagem Marcial. Na turbulenta fronteira, Zhang Qian é um homem que reencarnou do nosso mundo moderno e confortável, mas seu novo ambiente não é nada como o mundo fantasioso com o qual ele sonhava ao ler novels de artes marciais. Enquanto as artes marciais em seu novo mundo são poderosas, elas também são grosseiras demais e não tem elegância. E assim Qian começa sua jornada pelo continente pelo sonho de trazer as artes marciais de verdade para o novo reino marcial.

altTitles.zh-ro: Xing Meng Ou Xiang Ji Hua

description.en: The shining lights, the magnificent stage! Friendships created through singing, making a future through dancing, the girls embark on their journey towards their dreams! One who has lost status due to a scandal is hiding a plot behind her back. A pair of bosom friends, separated by fate. A girl who tries to exonerate her mother sets off on her journey for a talent competition. When the stage turns into an empty battlefield, she uses her voice to chase after her dreams.

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu

description.de:
Der Teenager Ichikawa Kyoutarou gehört zu den allerletzten auf seiner Schule. Neben seinen Bemühungen, Unterhaltungen mit einer bestimmten Klassenkameradin aufrechtzuerhalten, muss er sich außerdem noch dafür zusammenreißen, mörderische Dränge aus den Tiefen seiner Seele zu verbergen.

Eigentlich ist es aber eine niedliche Liebesgeschichte zwischen einem geistig gestörten Jungen und einer fröhlichen, leicht komisch, jedoch schönen Mädchen.
description.en:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

- Won the Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020 Award.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taisho Award.
- Won the top prize of 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards
description.ja:
学園カースト頂点の美少女・山田杏奈の殺害を妄想してはほくそ笑む、重度の中二病の陰キャ・市川京太郎。だが山田を観察する内に、京太郎が思う「底辺を見下す陽キャ」とは全然違うことに徐々に気づいていき…!? 陰キャ男子

---

- Exclusive art is occasionally posted to [the series' official account](https://twitter.com/boku__yaba/status/1060017522303414273)
description.ru: «Страшный психо-триллер», сосредоточенный на «тёмной стороне юности». История повествует о Киотаро Ичикаве — человеке, находящемся на самой низшей ступени в своей школе и скрывающем убийственный порыв, находящийся в самой глубине его души... на деле же, это милый ром-ком про странного мальчика и прекрасную, хоть и слегка странную, девушку.
description.es-la:
La historia trata sobre un joven llamado Kyotaro Ichikawa que sufre de un caso grave de “chūnibyō” y se divierte imaginando la muerte de una hermosa chica llamada Anna Yamada, quien está en la cima de la jerarquía social de la escuela. Sin embargo, mientras observa a Yamada, Kyotaro comienza a darse cuenta de que ella es muy diferente de lo que él pensaba.

 - Ganó el premio Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020.
- Fue nominado para el premio Manga Taisho en 2020 y 2021.
- Ganó el primer premio en los premios Tsutaya Comic de 2021.
description.pt-br:
Um "intenso thriller psicológico" centralizado no lado obscuro da adolescência. 

O mangá gira em torno de Kyoutaro Ichikawa, uma pessoa no fundo da hierarquia de sua escola, que esconde um impulso assassino no fundo de sua alma. Mas na realidade, é uma doce comédia romântica entre um garoto confuso e uma garota brilhante, embora um tanto estranha e bonita.

description.en:
Im Dajun is a high school student who gets bullied at school every day. He came across an interview on TV just when he was on the verge of giving up on life. It was with a murderer who killed the classmates that bullied him. Dajun becomes inspired by what he saw and decides to take revenge as well.

His revenge was successful. However, his life steered into an undesired direction. Im Dajun, leaving school, ends up joining a strange Runaway Fam.

The young runaway, Im Dajun, no longer suffers from the bullies at his school. Instead, he now must survive against even more vicious thugs on the streets.

---

これは生存を賭けた命がけの闘い！

description.ko:
고등학생 임다준은 학교에서 늘상 괴롭힘을 당하는 게 일상이었다. 삶을 포기하기 직전 우연히 본 티비 속 동급생 살해범의 인터뷰에 감명을 받고 복수를 결심하게 된다.
복수는 성공했지만 삶은 원치않는 방향으로 흘러가게 되고.. 학교에서 나온 임다준은 범상치않은 가출팸에 들어가게 된다.
가출청소년 임다준은 더이상 학교 안 일진들에게 시달리지 않게 되었지만 그보다 잔혹한 길거리의 양아치들을 상대로 살아남아야만 한다.

삶의 끝자락에 내몰린 고등학생 임다준의 길거리 생존기!

---

description.zh:
懦弱少年复仇后无家可归，
残酷的街头生存挑战开始！
男主任多骏经常被欺负。在他想要寻短见的那一刻，偶然看到电视里的一段采访，感触颇深，决定报仇。而后虽然复仇成功，但他的人生却也朝着无法预测的方向发展。被父亲赶出家门的他开始街头流浪，必须要面对更残酷的街头混混生活。被逼上绝路的他能否生存下来呢？

---

description.zh-hk:
高中生林多俊每天在學校遭受以李道允為首的不良學生們的霸凌，在他想結束自己的生命以解脫的前一晚，偶然在電視上看到殺害多名霸凌者的高中生的訪問，而萌生報仇的念頭。某次又受到李道允的霸凌時，他將道允推向衝來的貨車。在看似成功的復仇之後，席捲而來的是....？

title.en: P.S. Waiting for You by the Lake

description.en: Leo and Alexis lived in the same small town when they were kids and were best buddies. The two loved to spend their summers at the Green Rock Lake summer camp near town. But during the summer when they were eleven, Alexis ended his friendship with Leo over a stupid reason. After that, the two did not see each other again because of their families' situation. But during the summer when they were eighteen, the two met once again at Green Rock Lake...

title.en: The Reborn Young Lord Is an Assassin

altTitles.en: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
The Regressed Youngest Son of the Duke Is an Assassin

description.en:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

(Source: WEBTOON)

altTitles.en: Elves are Waiting for the Night

altTitles.ja: 四姉妹は夜をおまちかね

altTitles.zh-hk: 精靈四姐妹夜夜待笙歌

altTitles.ja: 四姉妹（エルフ）は夜をおまちかね

altTitles.en: The Four Sisters (Elves) Wait For The Night

description.en: Who will you “play” with tonight—? A sweet and sugary harem romantic comedy about sleeping with elves ♡

title.en: The Chaotic God of Extraordinary Strength

description.en:
Zheng, the ‘Slaughtering Scythe Ghost’ who finds pleasure in killing.

He happens to have the exact same face as the Third Young Master of the Great Orderly Wooden Sword Hall, Mok Gyung-Woon…
“Become my body double. That way, I’ll let you out of this prison.”

“Will you give me that opportunity?”
‘Crack-!!!’
He kills the Third Young Master and decides to become the ‘real’ one. Can the fake Mok Gyung-Woon survive as the real one? The serial killer begins his new life as the Third Young Master of the Great Orderly Wooden Sword Hall.

title.en: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.ja: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん

altTitles.ru: Аля, которая сидит рядом со мной, иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски
Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.vi: Arya-san bàn bên thi thoảng lại trêu ghẹo tôi bằng tiếng Nga

altTitles.zh-hk: 不時輕聲地以俄語遮羞的鄰座艾莉同學

altTitles.id: Alya-san Terkadang Menyembunyikan Perasaannya dalam Bahasa Rusia

altTitles.pt-br: Alya-san geralmente esconde seus sentimentos em russo

altTitles.ne: आल्या कहिलेकाहीँ रूसी भाषामा आफ्नो भावना लुकाउँछिन्

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya-san Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

description.en: Masachika Kuze sits next to Alya, a girl of Russian and Japanese descent. She’s beautiful, haughty, and an exceptional student, while Masachika is nerdy and known for being a slacker. He’s an easy target for her comments in Russian, which she’s all too happy to translate—except he can understand what she’s really saying!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

description.en:
Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.”

Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead.

With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.fr:
"Quel est le métier le plus utile pour survivre dans un monde en ruine ?". Cette question apparaît devant Seong-woo alors qu'il somnole en cours. Lui et les autres étudiants ont 15 secondes pour choisir une carte parmi celles qui sont apparues devant eux. Celle choisie déterminera leurs pouvoirs qui leur permettront de survivre dans un monde chaotique, qui ressemble fortement à un jeu vidéo. Pour sa part, Seong-woo sera un nécromancien !

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.id:
Pekerjaan apa yang akan kau pilih untuk bertahan hidup saat dunia hancur oleh monster-monster yang tiba-tiba bermunculan?! Setelah memilih 'Necromancer' sebagai pekerjaannnya, Sungwoo dapat menjadikan monster yang telah ia kalahkan menjadi pengikutnya!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.ko:
곧 세상이 멸망한다.
전설 속에나 나올 법한 몬스터들이 각지에 출현한다.
그리고 사람들을 잡아먹고, 길거리를 점령하며, 빌딩과 지하철에 던전을 만들기 시작한다.

멸망한 세계에서 살아남기 위해 단 한 가지 직업을 고를 수 있다.
당신은 무슨 직업을 고르겠는가?
"네크로맨서"

나에게는 멸망이 무대이고, 죽음이 자산이 된다.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.ru:
Мир на грани разрушения. Существа, упоминания о которых встречались лишь в мифах и легендах, теперь заполоняют города, обживаются под людскими жилищами и в метро, пожирая всё живое.
А что до человечества… Ему будет предложено занять новую роль в нынешнем мире выживания.
Сонву выбрал класс «некромант», и теперь трупы, что обагряют Землю, ему только на руку.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.zh:
魔物侵袭，世界灭亡在即！
退役特种兵的降维打击！
某一天，只存在于传说中的魔物们突然出现，肆意地破坏街道、撕咬人类，并且在高楼和地铁建立起了自己的巢穴…如果在灭亡的世界，能够选择一个职业，你会选择哪种职业呢？对于身为“死灵法师”的刘成宇来说，灭亡即是舞台，丧生即为资产。

---

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)

description.en:
After being put on trial, the deity once known as The Divine Twilight is offered a job by Thanatos, king of the underworld! Now, the fallen deity is back on Earth as his former self, Lee Changsun, and is tasked with sealing those trying to invade from beyond. With the promise of a fresh start, Changsun is gathering the gear and skills needed to get the job done, but he's feeling some watchful eyes on him...

Will this Divine Twilight see a new day, or is the sun setting on his second chance?
description.ko:
한낱 인간에서 신의 위치까지 오른 '신들의 황혼'
흉신으로 위명을 떨치다 신좌, 신앙, 신위…… 모든 걸 잃었다.
신성도 끊어졌고, 신력도 사라졌다.

“짐과 같이 일을 좀 해 주었으면 한다.”

그런 그에게 명계의 주인, 타나토스가 손을 내미는데……
그 손을 잡은 '신들의 황혼'은 이제 플레이어 '이창선'으로 다시 살기 시작한다.
자신을 나락으로 떨어트린 신들의 목을 쥐기 위해!

‘돌아왔구나, 정말로.’

After experiencing multiple diastrophisms, the Earth’s sea level rose exponentially. 
Hoju wants to show his daughter, Han Byoel, the world and heads toward his hometown. There are multiple strange marks in the town he hasn't visited for 20 years… Will the two be able to survive safely?

title.en: The Princess Has a Rosy Dream

altTitles.ja: 吸血姫は薔薇色の夢をみる

altTitles.ja-ro: Princess wa Barairo no Yume wo Miru

altTitles.en: Vampire Princess Sees a Rose-Colored Dream

altTitles.ja-ro: Kyuuketsu Hime wa Barairo no Yume wo Miru

description.en:
"She" was supposed to have fallen into eternal sleep. However, a sudden accident woke her up, and "he" find "herself" reincarnated in a game "he" was playing when "he" was alive.

"I" have reincarnated as my own character, a beautiful vampire princess, and while surrounded by her demon underlings that "I" raised in the game, "I" ended up reigning at the top of a demon empire...!

description.ar: لقد مضت ست سنوات منذ بدء اللعبة لتحديد مصير العالم. الملك البطل كانغ يو سونغ، أقوى لاعب لم يهبط من مركز هداف الدوري مرة واحدة، يرحب بالموسم الجديد أيضا. “لقد… انتهيت منذ وقت طويل. إنني أفعل ذلك فقط من أجل المال.” [مستوى التذمر قد أزداد بشكل كبير!] [يعرب شيخ اليقطين عن إرتياحه لتصرفات اللاعب!] ان طريقة النجاة للاعب الموهوب المجنون تتكشف الآن!
description.en:
[By Red-Ice Studios, creators of the series  ‘Solo Leveling and Omniscient Reader’s Viewpoint’]

It’s been six years since the game to decide the fate of the world had started. Hero-King Kang Yoo-Sung, the strongest player who hasn’t dropped from the top ranker’s position once, greets the new season, too.

“I… was finished a long fucking time ago. I’m just doing it for the money.”

[Taunt Level has drastically increased!]

[The Elder of Jesters expresses satisfaction with the actions of the contractor!]

altTitles.en: I'll give my teacher a tickle.

altTitles.ja: 先生のこと、くすぐってあげる

description.en:
Shuuma Aguri isn’t like other high school boys. He doesn’t get into sexual talks with his friends, and he sits alone. While he does have a secret fetish, he keeps it to himself - after all, who would willingly talk to a guy with a tickle fetish?

The only solace he has in his life is Anzu, a girl he met online who herself has a desire to be tickled. The two decide to meet up one day, only for Shuuma to find out that Anzu… is actually his teacher, Maiko Ogura?

title.en: Saikyou Skill "Inochigoi" de Kuyashii Kedo Musou Shichau Moto Maou-sama no Sekai Seifuku Katsudou

altTitles.ja: 最強スキル「命乞い」で悔しいけど無双しちゃう元魔王様の世界征服活動

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou Skill "Inochigoi" de Kuyashii Kedo Musou Shichau Moto Maou-sama no Sekai Seifuku Katsudou

altTitles.en: Her Strongest Ability Is Begging for Mercy, the Frustrating World Conquest Adventures of a Former Demon King

altTitles.vi: Hành Trình Chinh Phục Thế Giới Đầy Nhục Nhã của Cựu Ma Vương Với Kỹ Năng Thượng Thừa "Cầu Xin Tha Mạng"

description.en:
Village girl Chelsea, who is beloved by everyone, is actually the reincarnated ex-Demon King.
However, when she reincarnated, for some reason neither her magical powers nor skills were inherited, and she was forced to live as a normal human being.

Humiliating days continued until one day, the remnants of the Demon King's army appeared to loot the village. Hunted down by her former subordinate, who did not realize her true identity, Chelsea finds herself in a perilous situation. Then, a skill finally manifests! The name of that skill is "Begging for Mercy"!?
description.ja: 誰からも愛される村娘のチェルシーは、実は転生した元魔王。 しかし、転生の際になぜか魔力もスキルも引き継げず、ただの人間としての生活を強いられることに…。 そんな屈辱の日々が続くある日、村に魔王軍の残党が略奪に現れる。 自分の正体に気づかない元部下に追い詰められ、絶体絶命のピンチに陥るチェルシーだが、ついにそこでスキルが発現！ そのスキルの名は――「命乞い」!?

description.en: Baphomet is the ruthless, dispassionate lord of the Abyssal Tower, a mysterious, monster-filled dungeon plaguing the human world. Many Hunters seek to defeat him and bring the tower down to no avail. Despite his demonic power, Baphomet grows curious about humanity. One day, Baphomet is defeated by Raven, the strongest Hunter, and realizes that his true wish is to be just like the humans he previously looked down on. In death, he is granted his wish, as he awakens as a human – without his powers!
description.fr:
Baphomet, le boss de la , attend un chasseur fort capable de se battre à armes égales contre lui.

Lorsqu’il s’est lassé de ces combats répétitifs, il a commencé à s’intéresser au monde de l’humanité grâce aux trophées qu’il avait obtenus des chasseurs morts.

Dans le même temps, il fut de plus en plus fasciné par l’existence des humains lorsque le puissant chasseur dont il avait toujours rêvé apparut devant lui.

Finalement, Baphomet essaie de devenir lui-même un humain…

description.en: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

description.en:
A scout in the infamous Demon Cult, Seolhwi is on a routine patrol when his squad unexpectedly encounters a fearsome master of the Mount Hua Sect, the sworn enemies of the Demon Cult. Without warning, the Mount Hua Cult master slaughters the entire squad. As Seolhwi lies dying, lamenting years of service to the cult with nothing to show for it, he is suddenly faced with a video game prompt, asking if he would like to start again. Given the opportunity to start over and make different choices, Seolhwi vows to survive and become stronger so he can rise to the top of the Demon Cult.

---

description.id:
Sebuah window pilihan muncul di depan matamu, tanpa mengetahui masa depan yang akan terjadi. Di dunia di mana hidup dan mati di tanganmu, kita tentunya akan mencari jalan yang terbaik. Kau siap membuat pilihanmu?

---

description.ja:
魔教の太皇閣主「司魔鬼（しまき）」の命令で華山派の出没地域に派遣された飛客組。「雪輝（せつき）」は華山派の絶対的実力者である「究種明（きゅうしゅめい）」に殺されそうになるが、そのとき目の前に突然、謎の画面が浮かび上がり任務を受ける直前に戻ってしまう。雪輝は前世で自分が殺される原因となった任務に再び就くことになるが、少しでも周りの環境を変えようと奮闘する。危機に陥るたび目の前に現れる画面、そして結果が全く予想できない選択肢。生と死が共存する世界で最善の方法を見つけて進みつづける。

---

description.ko:
마교의 태왕각주, ‘사마귀’의 명령에 의해 화산파 출목지역으로 파견나간 비객조. 
주인공 ‘설휘’는 화산파 고수 '구종명'과 맞딱드리고, 죽을 위기에 처하게 된다.
그때 눈앞에 상태창이 나타나 정찰임무를 받기 직전 시점으로 회귀하게 된다. 
설휘는 전생에서 죽임을 당했던 똑같은 정찰임무를 받게되자 이 변하지 않는 현실을 바꾸기 위해 발버둥 친다. 
고비마다 눈앞에 나타나는 선택창.
미래를 알 수 없는 선택들.
삶과 죽음이 공존하는 세상 안에서 최고의 방법을 찾기 위한 설휘의 일대기.

---

description.ru:
Группа разведчиков была направлена в район секты горы Хуаньшань их великим лидером Мантисом. Главный герой, Соль Хви, сталкивается с Мастером секты Хуаньшань – Гу Чжон Мен и оказывается на грани смерти. Появляется окно статуса, которое возвращает его в то время, когда он ещё не принял роковую миссию. 
Вновь получив этот билет в один конец, Соль Хви изо всех сил пытается изменить свою судьбу. Окно статуса, которое появляется в критические моменты. Выбор с неизвестными последствиями. 
Это история Соль Хви, пытающегося найти лучшее решение, идущего по грани жизни и смерти.

---

description.tr:
Hua Dağı Mezhebinin bölgesine büyük lider ‘Mantis’ tarafından bir grup izci gönderildi.

Kahraman ‘Seol Hwi’ Hua Mezhebinin ustası ‘Goo Jong Myung’la karşılaşır ve ölümle karşı karşıya gelir.

Daha sonra bir durum penceresi açılır ve keşif görevi verilmeden önceki zamana dönmesini sağlar.

Onu ölüme sürükleyen keşif görevini aldıktan sonra, Seol Hwi kaçınılmaz gerçeği değiştirmek için mücadele eder.

Her krizde ortaya çıkan durum penceresi, geleceği belirsiz seçimler yaptırır.

Seol Hwi yaptığı seçimler ile en iyi kararı bulmaya çalışırken yaşam ve ölümle yüzleşmek zorundadır.
description.zh:
《金牌护卫》编剧新作！
无名小卒重生逆袭当天魔！
奉魔教的太皇阁主司魔鬼之命，被派往华山派出没地区的飞客组组长雪辉在即将被华山派绝顶高手绝命之时，突然眼前弹出来了带有“重新开始”选项的神秘弹窗，回到过去的雪辉，究竟能否通过“最后的机会”改变命运呢？

altTitles.vi: Merumo và Những viên kẹo thần kì

description.en:
A fantasy story for kids featuring a girl named Melmo, who can change her age as she wishes by eating special candies.  
  
Melmo's mother dies in a traffic accident, leaving young Melmo and her younger brother Totoo. Anxious, Melmo's mother in heaven asks God to prepare some magical candies, and hands them to Melmo.  
There are two kinds: Melmo can grow 10 years older to become any sort of adult she wishes by eating a blue candy. By eating a red one, she can become 10 years younger.  
  
Using these miracle candies, Melmo disguises herself as a nurse, schoolteacher, policewoman, and overcomes troubles together with her brother, Totoo.

---
**Volume 280 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**

title.en: The Terminally Ill Young Master of the Baek Clan

altTitles.en: Baek Clan's Terminally Ill Young Master

description.en: Baek Yigang is a son of the Baek Clan, one of the seven great clans of Zhongyuan. Afflicted with the Taiyin Qi Blockage, he is cursed with a shortened lifespan and the inability to collect internal energy. He had been peacefully spending the rest of his days indoors when he was ambushed by a group of masked people. During the ambush, he lost his servant who was like a sister to him. Chased by the attackers, Baek Yigang escaped through a secret underground path. When he came across a blocked path, he decided he’d at least die fighting and picked up a rusted sword that was stuck in the ground…

title.en: A Story About a Convenience Store Clerk With a Quiet Voice

altTitles.ja: 声の小さいコンビニ店員の話

altTitles.ja-ro: Koe no Chiisai Conveni Tenin no Hanashi
Koe no Chiisai Konbini Tenin no Hanashi
At the North Fort, Happy Days That I Spent With Everyone!

altTitles.id: Nama TerkaitDi Benteng Utara, Hari-hari Bahagia yang Aku Habiskan Bersama Semua Orang!

description.en:
Paw pads wrapped in white fur. Fluffiness around the neck. 
A bushy tail. A rounded figure that was the very definition of fur ball! 
A certain Japanese girl had been reincarnated into such a fox cub, Milfiria.
Milfiria was told to watch the house by her mother, as she left for the capital. 
However, unable to bear with the loneliness, she decided to follow her mother
but lost her way until she reached a fort protected by strong knights.

altTitles.th: โทรจิตละอองดาว

description.en: Umika is a very shy girl who has always been very bad at communicating with others. Over time she gave up on making any friends, until one day she meets the transfer student Yuu. Yuu claims to be an alien with the power of "Foreheadelepathy" - being able to read people's emotions by pressing her forehead to theirs.    From the up-and-coming author Okuma Rasuko, a dazzling story about yuri, space and youth.
description.pt-br: Umika é uma estudante muito gentil e tímida. Ela acha difícil falar com outras pessoas e sonha em um dia conhecer alguém de outro planeta. Mas sua solitária vida escolar toma um rumo cósmico quando ela conhece a nova aluna transferida chamada Yu, uma alienígena com poderes telepáticos! As duas se aproximam e prometem um dia irem ao espaço. É assim que elas decidem construir um foguete e disparar em direção às estrelas, fazendo novas amizades pelo caminho.

description.en:
Blue Archive GLB's official 4-Koma, featuring snippets of the daily occurrences in Kivotos!

For the Official English and Korean versions, you can find them on the respective server's Twitter account.

The series is titled (Global) to differentiate it from the Japanese 4-Koma.

title.en: Meikyuu Metro - Mezametara Saikyoushoku Datta node Shima Risu o Tsurete Shinsekai o Aruku

altTitles.en: Metro Labyrinth - When I Woke Up, I Had the Strongest Job, so I Teamed Up With a Chipmunk and Wandered the New World

altTitles.ja: 迷宮メトロ ～目覚めたら最強職だったのでシマリスを連れて新世界を歩く～

description.en:
When Shuu Abe - a 23 year-old hospitalized man - wakes up, he finds himself in a strange underground world rampant with monsters he has never seen before. In front of our puzzled protagonist, appears a talking chipmunk who's a girl(?) called Tamiko.

"Mister Hunter, let's squeak on to the surface together!" Says she as the two decide to work together to achieve their goal of escaping the labyrinth… 

The single weakling with the strongest job x a fluffy magical beast -an adventure of a unique pair has set its course!

title.en: Why Did Men Stop Wearing High Heels?

altTitles.ru: И почему мужчины не ходят на каблуках?

description.en: Kim Manseok is your average, everday guy but with one particular hobby: his love for high-end high heels. He owns his own personal blog and is known as a woman online but one day, his identity is exposed! Will he be able to continue his life as an ordinary salary man?
description.pt-br: Kim Manseok é um cara comum, mas com um hobby em particular: seu amor por saltos altos de alta qualidade. Ele possui seu próprio blog pessoal e é conhecido como mulher online, mas um dia sua identidade é exposta! Ele será capaz de continuar sua vida como um assalariado comum?

description.en: “Look and you’ll die.” “Post a message and you’ll be cursed.” Horror begins to spread with the use of smartphones. Introducing a new series filled with mystery about the horrors of social media!
description.es-la: "Mira y morirás". “Publica un mensaje y serás maldecido”. El horror comienza a extenderse con el uso de los teléfonos inteligentes. ¡Presentamos una nueva serie llena de misterio sobre los horrores de las redes sociales!

description.en:
What would you do with the chance to become far greater than your greatest rivals… before they could even start?

When a dominant guild gangs up on Rokan to humiliate him and destroy his hard-earned achievements in the world's most realistic fantasy VR game, he becomes desperate for revenge. But just when Rokan thinks he's lost it all, a twist in space-time sends him back to right before the game is even launched.

Now, this former SSS-class ranker sees the perfect opportunity to return to glory!
description.ko:
가상현실 게임 더 로드(The Lord)에서 최강자로 군림한 '폭력의 왕' 로칸.
적대 길드에서 내린 척살령으로 모든 것을 잃게 된다.
그런데, 자고 일어나니 3년 전 과거로 회귀했다!

"빌어먹을 자식들아, 기다려라. 모조리 씹어 먹어줄 테니까!"

과거로 회귀하여 다시 한 번 최강자로 군림하는 로칸의 이야기가 시작된다!
description.pt-br:
Lokan era o ‘Rei da Violência’ que reinou como o mais forte no jogo de realidade virtual, ‘The Lord’. Infelizmente, a ordem de assassinato emitida por uma guilda inimiga fez com que ele perdesse tudo. Para sua surpresa, da próxima vez que acordou, ele havia voltado três anos no tempo!

“Vermes do caralho, espere. Vou devorar todos vocês!”

Uma nova história começa quando Lokan, que viajou de volta no tempo, sobe de volta ao topo!

altTitles.ja: Holoearth Chronicles Side:E ヤマト神想怪異譚

altTitles.id: Holoearth Chronicles Side:E - Kisah Fantasi Yamato

altTitles.ja-ro: Holoearth Chronicles Side:E Yamato Kasou Kai Itan

description.en:
Come enter the world of hololive Alternative, an alternate universe fantasy project starring your favorite hololive VTubers!

This story has been lovingly brought to life by manga artist and hololive superfan Kurose Kousuke, of Goblin Slayer fame!

In the land of Yamato, humans live alongside kami. In the mountains near the city of Miyako sits Shirakami Shrine, where a certain kami has taken up residence and named herself acting priestess...
description.id:
Para Vtuber hololive beraksi di dunia fantasi dalam proyek karya dunia lain HOLOLIVE ALTERNATIVE.
Latar dunianya dikomikalisasi oleh Kurose Kousuke, seorang penggemar berat hololive yang juga dikenal sebagai orang yang menggambar komik "Goblin Slayer"!

Yamato, sebuah dunia tempat dewa dan manusia hidup bersama.
Ada suatu dewa yang tinggal di Kuil Shirakami, kuil yang lokasinya terletak agak jauh dari Kyo-no-Miyako.
Ia menyebut dirinya gadis kuil dan melindungi desa-desa dari Kegare.
description.ja:
「ホロライブ」のVTuber達が
ファンタジー世界で大活躍!!

「ホロライブ」のVTuberたちがファンタジー世界で活躍する、異世界創造プロジェクト「ホロライブ・オルタナティブ」。
その世界観を「ホロライブ」の熱烈なファンである、「ゴブリンスレイヤー」の黒瀬浩介がコミカライズ!!

カミとヒトが共に生きる世界「ヤマト」。
ミヤコから少し離れた山々の中にある「シラカミ神社」にはとあるカミが住み着き、巫女代行を名乗って村々をケガレから守っていた……。

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Oto Tomare! Sounds of Life

description.en: Since the graduation of the senior members of the club, Takezou ends up being the sole member of the "Koto" (traditional Japanese string instrument) club. Now that the new school year has begun, Takezou will have to seek out new members for the club, or the club will be terminated. Out of nowhere, a new member barges into the near-abandoned club room, demanding to join the club. How will Takezou be able to keep his club alive and deal with this rascal of a new member?

title.en: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.

altTitles.vi: Saiki Kusuo: Kẻ siêu năng khốn khổ

altTitles.en: The Disaster Of PSI Saiki Kusuo

description.en: Kusuo Saiki is a sixteen-year-old high school student with innate supernatural powers. What are his hassles and troubles triggered by his extraordinary ability? And what misfortunes fall upon him?
description.pt:
: ||Saiki Kusuo é um estudante de 16 anos de idade com poderes sobrenaturais inatos. Quais são seus aborrecimentos e problamas desencadeados pela sua ablilidade extraordiária? E quais infortúnios cairão sobre ele?||  


---

description.en:
**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ga Hito ni Naru Hanashi

altTitles.zh-hk: 我家碰太變成了人類這件事

altTitles.ja: ポン太がヒトになりまして。

description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and it's neighbors where "pet dogs" have become "humans"!
Feelings that couldn't be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly...!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.

description.en:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)

altTitles.en: Apotheosis – Elevation to the Status of a God
Principles of Heavens - Zen’s Cultivation of Immortality

description.en: Luo Zheng, now a humble slave was born as the eldest son of a wealthy family. Due to his family's decline, the kidnapping of his sister by a powerful force, he can now only be stepped upon by others. However, heaven never seals off all exits. An ancient book left by his father reveals a secret divine technique, giving the reader immense power! But what is behind this power? This is a contest against fate.
description.fr:
Luo Zheng est un esclave qui était auparavant fils ainé d’une famille riche. En raison du déclin de sa famille et de l’enlèvement de sa sœur par une force puissante, il est désormais piétiné et humilié par les autres. Cependant, le paradis ne scelle jamais toutes les sorties. Un livre ancien laissé par son père révèle une technique divine secrète, donnant au lecteur un immense pouvoir ! Mais que cache ce pouvoir ? Une course contre le destin débute !  
  


---

Official English Alternative:  
<https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/119>
description.it: Luo Zheng, ora un umile schiavo, è nato come il figlio maggiore di una famiglia ricca. A causa del declino della sua famiglia, del rapimento di sua sorella da parte di una forza potente, ora può essere calpestato solo da altri. Tuttavia, il paradiso non chiude mai tutte le uscite. Un libro antico lasciato da suo padre rivela una tecnica divina segreta, dando al lettore un potere immenso! Ma cosa c'è dietro questo potere? Questa è una gara contro il destino.

altTitles.en: The Heavenly Demon Can't Live a Normal Life
The Reincarnation of the Dark Master

altTitles.uk: Небесний демон не може жити нормальним життям

altTitles.pt-br: O Demônio Celestial não pode viver uma Vida Normal

description.en:
“Is this a mission I was sent on by the gods? Or is this just divine punishment?”

Baek Jung-hyeok, the Heavenly Demon of Murim, finds that he’s been reincarnated into the body of Roman Dimitri, the dim-witted son of a baron who’s obsessed with the luxuries of the aristocratic lifestyle. But with his new status, Jung-hyeok is ready to shake things up on the continent of Salamander.

Will the divine demon accomplish what he’s set out to do? And will he finally get the answers to this mysterious reincarnation?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.ko:
천마 백중혁, 드미트리 가문의 장남으로 눈을 뜨다.
드미트리의 얼간이, 차남에게 밀린 장남.
세간의 평판은 중요하지 않다.
천마, 아니, 로만 드미트리는 앞으로 평범하게 살 수 없다.
압도하는 천마 판타지!

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.ru:
Демон Пэк Чун Хёк.
Некогда сильнейшая личность в Муриме умирает и обнаруживает себя в теле старшего сына дома Дмитрий. В теле человека, которого все называют дураком. Человека, который постоянно находится в тени своего младшего брата и которому глубоко плевать на мнение окружающих.
Но теперь, демон... Нет, Роман Дмитрий больше не сможет жить привычной жизнью.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.uk: "Це місія, на яку мене послали боги? Чи це просто божественна кара?" Пек Чжун Хьок, божественний демон, повелитель Муріма, виявляє, що він реінкарнувався в тіло Романа Дмитровича, недоумкуватого сина барона, одержимого розкішшю аристократичного способу життя. Але з новим статусом Чжун Хьок готовий перевернути все на континенті Саламандр. Чи вдасться божественному демону досягти того, що він задумав? І чи отримає він нарешті відповіді на загадки цього таємничого перевтілення?
description.zh:
最强教主重生成异国废柴！
天不亡我！今生注定不凡！
武林最强天魔神教教主白钟赫生命自然终结后再睁眼发现自己成为了卢曼·德米特里，德米特里公认的傻子，且不如弟弟的德米特里长子。但外人的评价已经不重要。从此卢曼将不再浑浑噩噩，他的生活将会发生天翻地覆的变化，卢曼注定不再平凡！

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.pt-br:
“O Demônio Celestial” Baek Joong-Hyuk abre os olhos como o filho mais velho da família Dimitry. Conhecido como o idiota da família, deixado de lado por causa do segundo filho. A opinião do mundo é irrelevante. “Demônio Celestial”, não, Roman Dimitry, não pode viver uma vida normal.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
